captions: A wolf stands in a cluttered workshop, organizing tools on a table.
He sits in an office, staring at a flickering computer screen.
He walks through a quiet park, nodding at empty benches.
He enters a small café, operating a café machine.
audio: The clinking of metal tools on a wooden table.
The soft hum of a computer monitor.
Soft rustling of tree leaves in a gentle breeze
Whirring of a café machine brewing coffee.
